definition.text: Ok... maybe it's not actually like bending, but, bear with me... You'll love how you can shape time machines to whatever format you wish.

paragraphs.text: Hover your mouse pointer over any of the edges of the turquoise frame defining the time machine and see what happens. See how the edge is highlighted in yellow?
Cool! Now, left-click the frame and pull!
This is how you may shape time machines to your liking.
